attributes.title: VERY STINKY APP
attributes.review: I personally did not enjoy this app, but If you find joy in belittling others based off of their race, sexuality, etc, or even portray your bigot ideology as a “political stance” than this app will do just fine. :))

attributes.title: This should be deleted
attributes.review: This did not help at all it took up most my Space and I don’t understand why it is still up like oh my god

attributes.title: App won’t work
attributes.review: There’s this weird Cheeto ad for 2020 when you open the app, and in the background all I hear is Alyssa Edwards screaming BACKROLLS?! But I DO like the part where it says “r r r roll🙈 up 🙃to ☠️the 😳party🥶 with 🤯my 🤬crazy 🤪pink 💖wig🤩”

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: this app is so bad i downloaded it and got hacked by a Cheeto i’m so scared and upset. please don’t get this app:( i’m scared that it might have took all of my orange paint as well for your own benefit do not get this #dumptrump

attributes.title: My ISP banned this app?
attributes.review: My ISP just banned all internet connectivity while using this app due to it sending data to china?!? WHAT? I enetered my credit card info/ social to sign up!! i need an explanation!!!

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app ruined my phone. I had to restore it. This app also has a gravitational pull to awful soulless people like racists and white supremacists. It should be removed at once.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This app is horrible!!! It seemed to crash every time I opened it. The app is also very slow and does not seem interesting at all.

attributes.title: MY GRAMMA
attributes.review: I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!👁👄👁when i put in all my information ice came and drop kicked my gramma and now she is in the hospital😭AND THEY TOOK MY DOG back to mexico because he was a chihuahua 👻😿 my mom love ice the drink 🍷 BUT THEY HIT MY MOM AND SHE DIS A WHOLE 360😼MY DAD LEFT TO GET SUM COKE AND TURN OUT HE DEAD👾anyway pedo.... i’m mean trump 2020

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I’m Mexican and the whole time in the background you can hear trump saying build a wall to block your people over and over 😢😢😢🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: It was trash just like the president. It hacked all my data and wiped my phone and deleted tiktok from me. The Illuminati kidnapped me and then they thought they wiped my memory but they didn’t so I rember all of it
